website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for short snouted dog breeds who only need a few minutes of muzzle time, such as walking or grooming.
pros: Allows dogs to pant, eat and drink naturally
Easy to place on head and make adjustments
Bright nylon fabric is soft, visible and non-restrictive
Affordable alternative to metal cage muzzles
cons: Finding the right size can be a challenge
Some owners tell us their pets removed it in seconds
Covers more than mouth and snout

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this muzzle
customer_reviews.text: I'm hopeful that I'll be able to change this rating to 5 stars. I have to return the large and get an x-large to fit my bulldog. I'm sharing the info from the back of the package, because this information would have helped me select the correct size right away. I love the look of this muzzle, and my dog didn't mind it when I tried to get it on, but I couldn't get it buckled behind his head.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great for English bulldog
customer_reviews.text: I have an English bulldog who weighs about 55 lbs and it fits perfectly. Unfortunately I had to get one because he is aggressive towards my other male bulldog. The mesh is great idea coz it does allow his to breathe without any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Leizza

customer_reviews.title: Great for a stubby nosed boxer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boxer. Her short, stubby nose makes it hard to find a muzzle that stays on her and doesn't freak her out. Looks a little extreme but a safe alternative when I can't keep my eyes on her constantly and I cant trust her training at the moment. She was able to pull it off of her head, but I remedied that with a small carabiner clipped to the back strap of the muzzle and clipped to the D ring on her collar.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the M is not a fit for my Shih Tzu. Way too big. She could bite thru the opening. Funny, not funny. I would recommend a small for anyone ordering for a dog this size. Otherwise, this is the best muzzle I have seen for dogs with short snouts.
customer_reviews.author: TinaT

customer_reviews.title: I have French Bulldogs and this muzzle is fantastic! It fits perfectly and stays on (unless they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have French Bulldogs and this muzzle is fantastic! It fits perfectly and stays on (unless they can convince another canine accomplice to try and chew it off LOL) They can still drink water and eat small amounts of food while wearing it, but I would not suggest leaving it on for long periods of time. They cannot injure other dogs while wearing it. And it is very difficult to bark, my dog (who can be very yappy) wont even attempt to bark when she has it on. I highly recommend this for french bulldogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Parlogean

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a muzzle that works
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound Pekingese rescue dog who gets severe anxiety going to the vet. I have tried all kinds of flat nosed muzzles, including cat muzzles but she could get them all off. This muzzle, I can attach to her collar and she can't get it off (as easily - she is persistent and creative).
customer_reviews.author: grumpyshampoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boxer dog.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Boxer to cut his nails and it is the best thing I have ever bought. The muzzle is soft and doesn’t seem to upset him at all, in fact it makes him more relaxed and he doesn’t fight getting his nails trimmed. So thankful I finally tried this product. I totally recommend this muzzle for short snouted dogs.
customer_reviews.author: CLKnight

customer_reviews.title: This muzzle is a must for someone with a short ...
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is a must for someone with a short mugged, ass of a dog!!! My vet was so impressed with it's fit on my blind French Bulldog that he asked for the link so they could order some for the clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove on my Bulldog and helps to stop fighting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two male bulldog puppies and one constantly like to fights to gain control...Alpha male, so I bought this hoping it would solve my issue - it fits like a glove and he's learning that it goes on and he's placed in time out when fighting. Now the other male is fighting...ugh - boys - so I bought a second one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxi

customer_reviews.title: Fits our french bulldog great. He chews on things
customer_reviews.text: Fits our french bulldog great. He chews on things. Like, ALL things. Furniture, walls, cactus, you name it. This WAS working as a punishment-type thing. Except the ONE time he got it off and CHEWED UP THE CLASP!! We now have a zip tie in place. Still works. The mask, I mean. The dog is still broke. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle for my English Bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Great muzzle for my English Bulldog. He can still pant and I can give him treats while training him to not kill the vacuum. The design is really good and doesn't rub on his eyes or interfere with his breathing or swallowing.
customer_reviews.author: NJP

customer_reviews.title: Safe, comfortable and prevents biting!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a God send. Our new rescue French Bulldog is very aggressive to our existing dogs when they bark. We call the muzzle his "hoodie", He doesn't mind wearing it (he would prefer not to but it doesn't upset him). When he attacks the other dogs it prevents him from hurting them. I just bought a second one so that when I wash one he has a backup. I recognize this isn't an ideal permanent solution but until we and the trainer can change his behavior it works.
customer_reviews.author: Honest1

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great. Fits the head of English bulldogs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Seriously great. Fits the head of English bulldogs perfectly. Soft, flexible, and lets the dog breathe with struggling. I trimmed by old grumpy girl's toenails in one sitting without fear of being bit. Would buy again and will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small dog. He is a new puppy to us and our neighborhood. He has lately been barking more than usual when we walk. So I got it so we can walk freely and I wouldn't have to worry about him getting to close to my neighbors or biting them I followed the size chart, measured and got a medium for him. Once it came in the mail I tightened it and put it on him. It does fit snug but he pulls it off like nothing. Very disappointed returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole  S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Finally One That Works!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this product enough praise. I have a VERY sweet shih tzu that I groom myself. However, She hates when I come near her feet. It was a struggle to not get nipped. This arrived today and worked like a charm. The fit was perfect for her face, easy to put on- no struggle there. like putting on a collar- only encases her face. Took a second to put on. Clipped her nails and we were done! Gave her a big kiss and a big treat!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my American bully to wear when he goes out for potty breaks. He has a tendency to eat anything and everything and has even ended up in the doggie emergency room and almost died because of it! So, I purchased this item to hopefully deter him from eating gross things and it has worked amazingly well! I purchased a large and With a few adjustments of the straps it fits him perfectly! He was able to remove it once but once I adjusted the straps again he hasn’t been able to get it off and honestly waits for me to put it on him before he goes outside to do his business!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction for short nose dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and my frenchie can't take it off. She's a bit bigger than other frenchies, about 30 pounds and her head is pretty big. She's on the border line between medium and large I think. I bought a medium one and it works well, but obviously you don't want your dog to wear it for too long given the trouble they may have breathing over time. I just ordered a large, to see if maybe that will fit even better. Plan to use interchangeably since they get wet and dir with use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Yuan

customer_reviews.title: this muzzle is perfect for my frenchie who does not like other dogs
customer_reviews.text: this muzzle is perfect for my frenchie who does not like other dogs. I ordered size medium because he has a smaller head than most frenchies. Fits great! It does not fit my other frenchie, who has a larger head. He would need a size large!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love that he can still see and drink and take ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 20lb boston terrier perfectly. I love that he can still see and drink and take treats but can safely be around my tiny foster chi without worry that he will get it off. He's never been trust worthy around any animal smaller than him so we are working slowly, with this muzzle, to desensitize him to being around her.
customer_reviews.author: mom2blondies

customer_reviews.title: and the size was perfect. It has adjustable bands depending on how big ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is strong, and the size was perfect. It has adjustable bands depending on how big the dog's face is. My dog is very protective of me when I get visitors in my home and he gets territorial and so instead of putting him in a kennel, I bought this so he can get used to people going in my house. So far so good. He tries to take it off but the adjustable bands helps it to be snug and fit and so it stays as it is. The mesh is good for him to be able to see and breath. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Shien

customer_reviews.title: This is great for our Boston Terrier - he can't get it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our Boston Terrier - he can't get it off and it allows him to see and is soft enough not to be uncomfortable. Works great for short nosed dogs
customer_reviews.author: RenaM

customer_reviews.title: does a great job of keeping my Llasa's & Shih Tzus teeth ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, does a great job of keeping my Llasa's & Shih Tzus teeth away when I dremel their nails.
customer_reviews.author: imawareru

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the small size fit perfectly for my 6 lb Shih Tzu puppy. I had to adjust it to it's smallest fit but in doing so it should fit her indefinitely. She was very sensitive when I brushed her to remove small mats and would nip. She didn't mind the muzzle being put on or in use. Since using this she has learned to trust me and now I don't even have to use it a all! It took awhile though. It says "pet friendly" and I definitely agree with that. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for pug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our pug and he was able to pull it right off. The dog needs ears that aren’t floppy to be able to hold it on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally use muzzles but it's the only way to clean my boy's ears. I really like the idea behind it except it doesn't stay on-he has it off in seconds so I will be returning it. He's a shar pei with small flat ears-most likely the reason it falls right off. See the attach pic of him, it won't work on dogs with heads like his.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick for my French bulldog that is 24 ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick for my French bulldog that is 24 lbs. We didn't want him to bite as much so we kept putting this on him for one week and now he never bites anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble finding a muzzle for a boxer. After buying so many and having to return the, because she has such a short muzzle, I found this one. It fit her. But because it doesn't have a neck strap she was able to get it off with one swipe of her paw. That is why I am giving it 3 stars only. I can and will be sewing a neck strap to it. Just wish they made one that has that option.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: had to return because my dog has a bit more snout than this covers but it is well made And would be a great item for use with a pug, pekinese or other breed with a very abbreviated snout.
customer_reviews.author: lilibet

customer_reviews.title: A muzzle that actually fits a bulldog!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Next to impossible to find a muzzle that fits a bulldog! This one fits, is super breathable and he looks like he's going fencing :p. Prior to this muzzle, I'd been to countless stores and bought muzzles that would just fall off his flat squishy face.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: A muzzle that works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pug/chihuahua mix. His nose is not flat like a pugs, but it is not quite long enough to fit properly in a regular muzzle. With a regular muzzle he would have it off within two seconds. This one stays on though. I absolutely love it as he bites for nail trimmings, or any other vet related care. Now the people handling him can feel safe while he wears this. It's very easy to get on and off, and allows the dog to breathe easily still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Houdini
customer_reviews.text: Useless. My frenchie took it off in 20 seconds. It was entertaining watching him "houdini" his way out of it but I could have used the $20 to buy him treats! Product in my personal experience does not work.
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: My Pekingese got this off her face really easily. I think it will be good for discipline though because she likes to attack my parents' dog sometimes and when I put it on her at that point she will lay down for awhile with it on her face and then feels remorse and licks me afterwards. She usually doesn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for a geriatric and sickly Lhasa Aapso that I recently adopted. He's very fearful and I use this during grooming and general inspections/maintenance to prevent bites. Easy to put on. He's not very "wiggly" so I am not sure how effective it would be for a more determined or agile dog. It works for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Skies

customer_reviews.title: Great breathability
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you have a short anointed dog. Our American bulldog has a longer snout than most but this fits well. She’s not able to chew pads in paws. She doesn’t like it in tho and gets sad. She attempts to take off gently and has once but never again. She’s sweet and gentle so we won’t have problems. If you have a rough dog they may rip this.
customer_reviews.author: groovy girl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Teaching bulldog to be more social with other dogs
customer_reviews.text: Fit my English bulldog great. I had trouble with her snapping at other dogs and this has seemed to really be a great tool to help her be more social. I can see an improvement when she gets taken for a walk without the mask. She does not lunge at dogs anymore nor does she bark aggressively at others either. She can walk by a barking dog and not go out of control. The muzzle is not a permanent solution for us, but a temporary tool to help her behavior. The mask did take a couple of days to get used to, but she has grown accustomed to it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: This will not work if your dog isn't cooperative
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this works. My Shi Tzu will not let me get it on him. If your dog is cooperative, I'm sure this is great. If your dog isn't, it is extremely hard to get it on. The dog can turn, and bite it very easily before you snap it closed. I don't know if my snap has a defect, but it is very difficult to snap closed. And too easy for the dog to figure out his jaw can slip down when trying to snap.
customer_reviews.author: sunnysue

customer_reviews.title: No More Bites and No More Fights
customer_reviews.text: We have two English Bulldogs and a "Boston Bully" (Mother Boston Terrier/Father English Bulldog) these muzzles work with all three. They are the best muzzles available for short snout breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Brewski

customer_reviews.title: Allows dogs to run loose in yard with edibles
customer_reviews.text: Who would know my sweet love-everybody King Charles Cavalier dogs would need muzzles? But these fit the bill. The masks keep them from eating lizards and grass and whatever else they find in our backyard! We did have to make the mouth opening smaller by stapling with one staple-- still leaving their noses free.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: Initially got the medium one for my pekingese but it was too big on him. Now that I have the small, the mesh seems too tight on his face as its pressing down on his eyes and he could easily roll around for a few seconds to get it off of him. I think the design could benefit from one more loop on the side where the neck goes so it can attach to a collar and it would be stable that way
customer_reviews.author: thebobkats

customer_reviews.title: which is not healthy and is rather disgusting since the poop comes back out the way it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to stop our Boston Terrier from eating other animals poop, which is not healthy and is rather disgusting since the poop comes back out the way it entered our dog. Works well for our use and what a relief not worrying about the surprise attack of regurgitated poop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BINGO FOR SHORT NOSE DOGS
customer_reviews.text: We've looked everywhere including locally and on-line for a muzzle that would fit our small Yorkie who has a very short snout/nose. Finally we came upon this soft muzzle. It fits perfectly. We use it to prevent him from eating things he shouldn't outside. We're very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good mask, protective
customer_reviews.text: Good mask, protective. However if putting on your dogs to protect them from each other (fights), don't do it!!! Serious cuts and rash on face, almost like road rash, from the fighting friction/biting. We used on our two bulldog bitches and it didn't end well. We had to discontinue use immediately. But for the average use, yes, great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our English bulldog
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in a size large for our beagle-English bulldog mix. Fits perfect and she is comfy in it. She can drink in it too ( not that it stays on her long) we’re using it for socializing safely until she can learn how to behave with other dogs in public.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTina35

customer_reviews.title: Fit my large male Boston Terrier perfectly and really does ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my large male Boston Terrier perfectly and really does the job. At first he was afraid to take a step but once he started playing with another Boston he forgot all about it. Now when I put it on he pays no attention to it. He is a rescue dog who had been abused and bites when stressed. Now I feel safe taking him in public to work on socialization. This muzzle is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulldog faces!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great muzzle for my bulldogs. It works perfectly for their short flat face!! It fits like a glove. If you have a dog with a short muzzle/flat face then this is the muzzle you should get. I highly recommend it~From a bulldog mother....
customer_reviews.author: AC Outz

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best muzzle we could find for our boston terrier who ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best muzzle we could find for our boston terrier who has some aggression towards.....everyone and everything but us. Overall its a hit with him and he doesn't fight us to put it on and our vet was so impressed with it that they are going to start using them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my Boston Terrier.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my Boston Terrier even with the adjustments. He was able to get the part that goes under his chin into his mouth in about 3 seconds. Then he ripped it off quickly. I did not think I could return it, so basically I wasted my money. He weighs 20 pounds and I ordered size M which was the correct size. Possibly it would work for a pug. If you have a Boston Terrier it probably won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to put on and stays put; doesn't allow my Boston Terrier to snap at other dogs. Cons: Doesn't allow my dog to pant freely, which means I cannot use in warm weather or on extra long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BITING
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years of getting bit by my dog while "trying" to trim his nails, I finally found a muzzle that fit his cute Boston Terrier face! He still tries to bite me but the muzzle saves me. And he no longer scratches people with his long nails.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart needs to be fixed or redone
customer_reviews.text: It was well made but the sizing chart is way off. I bought the muzzle for my boxer and it was way to big. Comfort would be a 5 star but it was so big I tried to rig it so it would stay on and her poor little head was swimming in the muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Mother ship

customer_reviews.title: Great on Old English Bulldogge
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting this for my 7 month old pup who is not a fan of the Dremel when getting groomed; so he snaps at the groomers. After slowly introducing him to it; he seems ok with it on and it’s a great fit. I ordered a Large
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tee 619

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great! We have a French bulldog who is obsessed with eating everything and has had to have surgery to remove rocks he had swallowed. We bought this for peace of mind and for his own safety. Could not find anything in town that fit on his cute fat head! This fits perfectly. He doesn't care for it much but will get used to it. I would recommend this product, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Boston Terrier perfect. She likes to eat things off the ground and occasionally nips at other dogs while on our walks--NOT while wearing this muzzle. She didn't like it at first, but I make it into a fun game to put it on, and now she don't mind wearing it. I only use it for short periods of time and always under supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Norket Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug and comfy on english bulldog
customer_reviews.text: This fits my english bulldog perfectly (size large) for the occasions where she's being grumpy around others, keeps things in control without stress and she seems very comfortable with it on. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this muzzle but unfortunately both of my frenchie's were able to pull the muzzle off within the 1st 10mins of wearing it. If they are left together for too long they end up getting into a huge fight. This muzzle is not heavy duty enough for anything serious like fighting or biting
customer_reviews.author: TJVanOs

customer_reviews.title: Best for Bulldogs
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog groomer and I use this on my bulldogs who try to bite. I wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Book addict

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate that our building requires muzzles and it's been a challenge finding one for our French bulldog. Nothing seemed to fit but I tried this out and it's great! It fits perfectly, is very easy to put on, the orange color is fun and most importantly, she doesn't seem to mind too much. The first couple times she wore it she was fussy but now she wears it fine and just sometimes uses her paw to scratch at it. We're very happy and would recommend to other flat faced furry friends.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Everybody stays safe while Porgie, my 3 year old Shih Tzu is being attended to at vet or grooming.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the covering over his eyes and face but it is necessary because of the shape of a Shih Tzu's face. I like that he cannot slip out of this muzzle like he did with the standard snout type muzzles. His ability to breath is not hindered. Necessary to use for a very short period of time at the vet and grooming. He is a very happy dog, but scared. He does not like to be touched unless you are playing with him. I fully understand his point of view.
customer_reviews.author: Bird lover in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome short snout muzzle for Boston Terriers
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boston and he used to get very snappy and angry when I trim his nails! This calms him and protects me from getting bit! Would highly reccomend this product. Works perfectly! Dog doesn't mind wearing it either! Win/win
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short snout  muzzle
customer_reviews.text: This is the first muzzle we purchased for our Shih Tzu. He hasn’t tried take it off. Seems to work as needed for the short time it should be on any dog. Good product design imo. We had to exchange from a small to a medium. Quick refund & shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mlm

customer_reviews.title: Well made muzzle
customer_reviews.text: The medium fit my frenchie perfectly! Measuring under his snout and around his head behind his ears...it shows proper measurement technique on the packaging, so im not sure why they don't post a picture of this also? He is able to get it off it it is not snug! I don't have it on him for biting...I have it on so he won't eat things he isn't supposed to in the backyard that make him sick?!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bell

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for us
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful when this came in! It looked great like the picture and it fit great in my american bull dog. However it only lasted 10 minutes when I took our dog to the vet. She tore it off and broke the mesh on the top part of the muzzle making it useless. I had to give it a shot for the price. Personally if your dog tends to have aggressive behaviors and for your own piece of mind, spend the extra money and get another sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have it for our old english bulldog, does the trick
customer_reviews.text: So the Pros. True to size chart Decently Priced Nice and bright orange so it is easy to see she is wearing it easy to place on her head Cons Thin material that I see easily being ripped by her nails or paws over time It tends to block her nostril holes so we have to arrange it so the netting is over her nose instead
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Medium sized worked great for my small Boston
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the reviews, I eased my dog into wearing this with treats and short walks. He doesn't hate it! He also tried to bite two people without success with the muzzle on. He cannot get it off either. Only negative is that sometimes it gets too close to his eyes. I originally ordered a small. For reference, the small is cat sized.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Smaller stout? Without a doubt.
customer_reviews.text: Use this when cutting my dogs nails. Works great. He’s a puggle with a smaller stout and it still fits and works great. When this goes on, he knows what’s gonna happen.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonS.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my Boston
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our Boston Terrier because he tends to attack our other dogs if he sees a neighbor dog on our walks. Today was the first day to put it on him. He tried to paw it off, but we got him distracted by giving him a treat and then got him going on the walk. He did great. He was able to pant and eat his treat.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: My frenchie actually likes this mask. She thinks she ...
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie actually likes this mask. She thinks she is special. She can drink water and her and my boxer play the whole time she has it on (trying to get it off I think) but she hasn't been able to get it off. She mellows out and goes to sleep and it doesn't bother her.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for nail trims on Boxer
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer doesn't like to get her nails trimmed. She will bite. This worked great. We were able to trim her nails, and she didnt move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for boston terrier
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this (size M) for our boston terrier while she was nursing because she was a bit too rough with her pups and it fits perfectly. While she can rub it off with some force, we dont keep it on her unsupervised so if she tries we can just tell her to stop. She is able to drink and pant with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Large size fits my Pitbull (mix?) well. She weighs about 50 lb., is small, stocky, and slightly short in snout for the breed. I introduced this to her slowly, using plenty of tasty little treats as a do with new things and she accepted it without any bother.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Great product that mostly did what I intended it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product that mostly did what I intended it to do which was to stop my pug mix from snacking on acorns and mulch while on walks. The one design flaw is the opening in the middle is just big enough for him to sneak small acorns in with his over aggressive tongue. Maybe I just have a very driven dog but it is a small flaw that keeps me from listing it as 5 stars. The mask is great besides and accommodates his huge bulgy eyes with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Allows us to groom a little bit
customer_reviews.text: I think mine is twisted so that it doesn't snap correctly but we are able to get it to work on our shih tzu for a short time frame. It is a bit loose. Actually found that if we put some peanut butter on a rubber brush she will lick it off so we can brush her for a little bit before we have to muzzle her.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle for short snouted bully breeds
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our female English bully, when she’s got an attitude with our other pups. Fits well, true to measurements. She breathes easily, and can take treats and drink thru the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A Brooks

customer_reviews.title: ) This mask is well-made and stays on better than the others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have a black pug and it has been quite difficult to find a mask that he cannot remove. (He has to be masked in order to cut his nails.) This mask is well-made and stays on better than the others I have tried, but he was still able remove it after only two nails were trimmed. I have had to give up on masks (I have several). Now the vet has to sedate him in order to trim his nails. A $14 nail trim now costs $55 every six weeks. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Willey

customer_reviews.title: I have a boston terrier who doesnt like to be pet
customer_reviews.text: This really helped. I have a boston terrier who doesnt like to be pet, but strangers often try and get nipped. This 1) goes on and stays on his face much better than a basket muzzle (and we tried a few) 2) he doesnt seem to mind it as much. 3) alerts people to not approach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hodnett

customer_reviews.title: They were happy to resend out the right size and color quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong size and color the first time. They were happy to resend out the right size and color quickly though. Best muzzle for my French Bulldogs when it is nail trimming time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jlee

customer_reviews.title: Even though I measured my dog the way shown this ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though I measured my dog the way shown this still ended up being too big and he can get his head out of it without too much difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: hopkins85

customer_reviews.title: Best mask for a bulldog.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our bulldog and it is great! We were concerned about his ability to breath due to him being a brachycephalic breed. Once we got him acclimated to the mask he is now able to got to the vet without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky28105

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my English Bulldog so i could trim his nails. It does not stay on. With the way it attaches, i do not see how it could. I won't bother sending it back, but would not recommend this type of muzzle for a bulldog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit for a Shitzu
customer_reviews.text: My dog is not aggressive, but when we try to brush him....he nips....so we use this when we brush him, but thats its. It fits nicely on a small Shitzu.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Very handy when you have an overly exciteable doggy that loves to bite and lick!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Keeps my little Rocco from getting too excited when other dogs are near. Still allows him to eat and drink just fine although it would be better if it didn't also cover his eyes. All in all, it does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: PurduePatti

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size if in doubt.
customer_reviews.text: Since I didnt wear it myself...can say it was comfortable. But it was still too snug. I purchased the orange XL for him later and it fits great. Both my bulldog boys have them....and its piece of mind for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & BJ

customer_reviews.title: As good as it is going to get for a flat-faced dog
customer_reviews.text: It sort of works. If you need something like this for a pug, this is definitely as good as it is going to get. I use this so I can put medicine in my pug's ears. She hates it and otherwise bites.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easily comes off.
customer_reviews.text: The small size fits my ShiChi perfectly! She was measured at 10". She can get it off rather quickly but I am working with her not to. I'll probably find a way to connect it to her collar. 3 stars since I'll have to rig it but great product for the price. Only muzzle that works for a short snout big eyed pup like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalara

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: It's the only muzzle my dog hasn't been able to get off, but she has managed to tear a small hole in the side (not the mesh). It does not affect the function, it just looks a bit tired. Also, the hole for the nose is a bit big or misplaced (unsure really of why) so if she would attack a dog and the tip of an ear gets close to the hole she could actually get a hold of it. However, since there has been no other alternatives for me, I am pleased with the product. A plus is that it arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my flat nosed dog
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my flat nosed dog. Still have to be careful and watch, as I think he may be able to get out if he tries hard enough. But it works great for us when grooming body.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded MY expectation. If used too often can cause irritation. Gentle wash after 3xs.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia R. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: This worked so well our vet wants to order some ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well our vet wants to order some for her clinic to help some of their pups who are being boarded or for families who ask about ways to help their dogs. Our dog is no longer eating everything off the ground and clipping her nails is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: BEST MUZZLE FOR SHIH TZU'S!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! I have Standard sz adult Shih Tzus and this is the ONLY muzzle that I have found that stays on! My pups can actually still drink water and clean themselves. Great for grooming when they want to nip or bite. I am ordering a few more!
customer_reviews.author: USMC Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Well. . .size???
customer_reviews.text: Small is too small on my pug so I ordered another. Then the medium was too large. Nice concept and looks well-enough made but very disappointed that neither one fits.
customer_reviews.author: Chinqua

customer_reviews.title: Still too big for a small dog. :\
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents’ shitzu. They said it comes right off as soon as she wants it out of the way. I’m sure it a fine product as far as craftsmanship, but they just don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunM

customer_reviews.title: He could also breathe just fine which is always a concern for flat faced dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do my pekingese's nails. After adjusting it, he could not get it off no matter how hard he tried. He could also breathe just fine which is always a concern for flat faced dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: for my english B/Dog
customer_reviews.text: i have an english b/dog, i had to squeeze this muzzle really tight to hold, but my dog had some issues breathing, i re-adjusted again but then again she was free...not good for me...
customer_reviews.author: erarmas

customer_reviews.title: No more biting!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute lifesaver! This muzzle fit my Lhasa Apso well, and prevented him from biting the groomer. It was easy to put on and he was not able to remove it. For a short snout aggressive dog - this is your answer!
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Quick Escape
customer_reviews.text: Product was of high quality material, however my Lhasa Apso was able to slip out of it in seconds. It just wasn't quite the right shape for his head.
customer_reviews.author: Nursenola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Vet Visits!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this muzzle for my 70lb boxer. I bought a clip to secure the muzzle to his collar, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O.

customer_reviews.title: Great mask with hole!
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect for vet visit. My dog's head is about 14", so we went for the medium. He has a smaller head comparing to other frenchies. Probably closer to boston terriers. Duting the vet visit I could get his attention away from the doctor by letting him lick some peanut butter while he is getting a shot. The little hole worked great! I could still give him a small treat. I'm so glad I got this mask. I feel better for next vet visit:D
customer_reviews.author: Shinobu R.

customer_reviews.title: Still big for our little dog, but works!
customer_reviews.text: It certainly works! It barely reveals the top of his ears, but enough, that I can place the ear drops into his ears.
customer_reviews.author: Susan King

customer_reviews.title: Bulldog safe
customer_reviews.text: Saw way for our boy to go to the vet
customer_reviews.author: Dave A

customer_reviews.title: Muzzle for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This fits my shih tzu perfectly. I only use this at the vet. He's a senior dog and doesn't always like the vet visits.
customer_reviews.author: bab31674

product_meta.title: Canine Friendly Short Snout Dog Muzzle
product_meta.description: Color:Orange| Size:MediumThe Canine Friendly Short Snout Muzzle is made from breathable mesh and a durable nylon construction. Designed for short snouted canines that cannot fit a traditional muzzle. It features an adjustable slider and easy to use side release buckle that make muzzling quick and convenient. The soft bumper on the top of the muzzles prevents the mesh from rubbing the eyes. The soft fit muzzle is the perfect addition to any pet first aid kit. Designed as a temporary restraint only. Never leave a muzzled dog unattended as prolonged use or improperly fitted muzzles can affect a dog's natural ability to cool itself. Size medium fits an end of snout circumference between 11-17 Inch.
feature_bullets: Made from breathable mesh and durable nylon construction
Adjustable slider and easy to use side release buckle
Soft bumpers that prevent the mesh from rubbing on eyes
Size Medium fits a head circumference of 11-17 inches

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
